SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class ObjectiveDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.ObjectiveDeck
public class ObjectiveDeck extends Object
ObjectiveDeck is the class that represents the Deck that contains all the objective cards. As opposed to the other deck classes, it doesn't implement Deck class because it returns a Card, but ObjectiveCard doesn't extend Card.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ObjectiveCard[]
    cards
    The cards field represents the main deck of all 16 objective cards in the ObjectiveDeck class.
    private int
    NCards
    NCards is the integer to track the number of cards of the objective deck.
    private ObjectiveCard1[]
    temp_deck1
    temp_deck1 is an array that memorizes objective card type 1 loaded from JSON.
    private ObjectiveCard2[]
    temp_deck2
    temp_deck2 is an array that memorizes objective card type 2 loaded from JSON.

  • Field Details

    • NCards

      private int NCards
      NCards is the integer to track the number of cards of the objective deck.

    • cards

      private ObjectiveCard[] cards
      The cards field represents the main deck of all 16 objective cards in the ObjectiveDeck class.

    • temp_deck1

      temp_deck1 is an array that memorizes objective card type 1 loaded from JSON.

  • Constructor Details

    • ObjectiveDeck

      public ObjectiveDeck()
      Constructor initializes number of cards, load cards data from JSON,deserializes JSON data into arrays of ObjectiveCard1 and ObjectiveCard 2 objects. Then initialize resource maps for ObjectiveCard2, prepares and shuffles the main deck of cards with the loaded cards.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public ObjectiveCard draw()
      Draw method is used to draw to allow to have it in the hand of the player who carries it out.
      Returns:
      one of the cards loaded from JSON

    • getNCards

      public int getNCards()
